name: Red Panda Runner
description:
IF YOU WANNA UPLOAD YOUR SCORE USE DESKTOP VERSION! (All web players will share the same score)

You are a red panda that has to collect apples and coins to get the max score you can!

 Upload your score  to a leader board and be the best worldwide. Dodge the bees, break the bamboo and jump the obstacles to get as far as you can.

Speed increases over time, so make sure to grab all the apples and coins you can!

If you want full screen in browser use the bottom right blue button, not the in game full screen option!
